keys: sensores de la entrada de información

          <title>
            <string language="en">Input sensors: push switch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Input-Sensoren: betätigen Sie Schalter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Capteurs d'entrée : poussez le commutateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sensores da entrada: empurre o interruptor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sensori dell'input: spinga l'interruttore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αισθητήρες εισόδου: διακόπτης ώθησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sensores de la entrada de información: 
empuje el interruptor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations showing examples of input sensors. In a push switch, the switch stays on with constant application of pressure.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Control systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">door</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">input sensors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Push switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen, die Beispiele der 
Input-Sensoren zeigen. In einem Stoßschalter bleibt der 
Schalter an mit konstanter Anwendung des Drucks.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois illustrations montrant des 
exemples des capteurs d'entrée. Dans un commutateur de 
poussée, le commutateur reste en fonction avec l'application 
constante de la pression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações que mostram 
exemplos de sensores da entrada. Em um interruptor do impulso, o
interruptor permanece sobre com aplicação constante da pressão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano 
gli esempi dei sensori dell'input. In un interruttore di spinta,
l'interruttore rimane sopra con l'applicazione costante di pressione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν παραδείγματα 
των αισθητήρων εισόδου. Σε έναν διακόπτη ώθησης, οι 
παραμονές διακοπτών επάνω με σταθερή εφαρμογή της πίεσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones que muestran 
ejemplos de los sensores de la entrada de información. En un 
interruptor del empuje, el interruptor permanece encendido con la 
aplicación constante de la presión.</string>
          </description>
